attributes.action: Parliament to petition HM The Queen to dismiss Boris Johnson as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
Specifically, the Ruling of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom on 24/09/19 regarding the prorogation of Parliament. 

More generally, Boris Johnson's misleading statements and untruthful statements are well documented by the general media and well known to the Members of Parliament and the general public.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:
https://petition.parliament.uk/
